overview: What starts as an innocent joke turns into a nightmare for 12-year-old Solveig, and at the center is a boy who can do nothing but lie. In a prank video, she gets caught up in a lie she doesn't want to be a part of. On social media, we are all storytellers and can freely construct versions of ourselves as we want others to see us. We can edit, recut and steal freely. Or can we?
title: Vær deg selv, nok
